420.08 + 375.58 + 346.68369627 + 291.07612692 + 235.21708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 190.71708718 + 190.71708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 = 5,586.08

Calculating the sum:

Therefore, the final interest income item in the income statement is $5,586.08.

Wait, I need to verify this calculation to ensure accuracy. Let me recalculate using a more systematic approach:

January 1 to January 10 (10 days):
420.08 + 375.58 + 346.68369627 + 291.07612692 + 235.21708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 = 2,666.64

January 11 to January 20 (10 days):

January 21 to January 30 (10 days):

Total: 2,666.64 + 1,736.27 + 1,355.37 = 5,758.28

I notice a discrepancy in my calculations. Let me double-check by summing these values individually:

Total = 420.08 + 375.58 + 346.68369627 + 291.07612692 + 235.21708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 199.61708718 + 190.71708718 + 190.71708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 164.01708718 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001 + 135.53708718000001

This gives me a total of approximately 5,757.29.

Therefore, the interest income is $5,757.29.
